synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystals of 1 (G = nitrobenzene) were immersed in ethyl acetate for 24 h to produce solvent-exchanged 1 (G = ethyl acetate, x = 4).

synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvent: gentle flow (1 ml h-1) of 17.7 mM solution
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: A red single crystal of 1 (G = ethyl acetate) was immersed in a gentle flow of acetaldehyde (ethyl acetate solution, 17.7 mM) at 215 K for 10 min.

synthesis_conditions.yield: hemiaminal 4 fully converted into Schiff base 5
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: After crystallographic analysis, the crystal containing intermediate 4 was warmed from 90 K to 270 K for 30 min.
